Query:
select a.AuthorId, a.Name as [AuthorName], a.ZipCodeId, c.Name as City from Author a
inner join Zipcode zc on zc.ZipCodeId = a.ZipCodeId
inner join City c on c.CityId = zc.CityId
where c.Name = 'Charlotte'
ParsedQueryStage1: SELECT a.AuthorId , a.Name as [AuthorName] , a.ZipCodeId , c.Name as City  FROM Author a inner join Zipcode zc on zc.ZipCodeId = a.ZipCodeId inner join City c on c.CityId = zc.CityId   WHERE c.Name in { CityNames }
ParsedQuery: SELECT a.AuthorId , a.Name as [AuthorName] , a.ZipCodeId , c.Name as City  FROM Author a inner join Zipcode zc on zc.ZipCodeId = a.ZipCodeId inner join City c on c.CityId = zc.CityId   WHERE c.Name in ('New York','Charlotte')

Query:
UPDATE a 
SET a.Name = 'abc' 
FROM dbo.Author AS a
INNER JOIN dbo.ZipCode AS zc 
       ON a.ZipCodeId = a.ZipCodeId
WHERE zc.ZipCode = '00000'
